docs.title: Welcome to Trent Docs

docs.text:
Quick Dirty Reddis Nspawn Container on Arch Linux


Create a FileSystem


cd /var/lib/machines
# create a directory
mkdir <container>
# use pacstrap to create a file system
pacstrap -i -c -d <container> base --ignore linux
